alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 02 at 2:57AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 20 inches across Natrona County, including Casper. Casper Mountain could see snow totals of 24 to 36 inches. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations and Casper Mountain. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible, especially Monday night through Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may melt during the day, especially on paved surfaces, resulting in accumulations less than forecasted totals.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
